      • ImageCache

        public ImageCache(@NonNull
                  Font font,
                  int duration)
        Constructs a new ImageCache.
        Parameters:
        font - The font.
        duration - The number of minutes, after the most recent access, that a cached image will be removed from the cache.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the font is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the duration is below 1.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieve

        public java.awt.image.VolatileImage retrieve(@NonNull
                                             Tile tile)
        Retrieves a tile image from the cache. If no image could be found, then one is created, inserted into the cache, and then returned.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile.
        Returns:
        The character image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the tile is null.

      • loadIntoCache

        public java.awt.image.VolatileImage loadIntoCache(@NonNull
                                                  Tile tile)
        Loads a tile into the cache.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile.
        Returns:
        The resulting tile image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the tile is null.
